If you are building a module to be used in a design manager drag n drop template. You could use the same html and css structure for layout. Generally though i advise custom coding it for your specific layout in your module. That will make it reusable.

If building a coded template often developers will use a framework like MJML or Zurb's Foundation for emails. Creating a responsive grid using tables and CSS is the best supported method, across email templates.
